ProductInfo.Features:
High Capacity, 4400mAh; 2-3 full charges or add 22 hours talk time to your iPhone 4S / 4G / 3GS; 1-2 charges for Samsung Galaxy S3, 200 hours + audio playback, or 200% - 300% to the battery life of most mobile phones
Convenient flashlight updated to prevent accidental activation: lights only after pressing the power button for 2 seconds; 4 LED indicators reveal the battery level; Input: DC 5V 1A, it also charges via standard USB or AC adapter (not included)LED indicates charge level
Portable & stylish design; Easily fits into your bag to provide instant power; PERFECT for long plane flights, road trips, or whenever you need to charge your mobile devices wherever you are
Reliable Lithium Polymer battery ensures high quality; 500+ recharge cycles over the life of the battery
This brand new item of high qulity is your best helper in your daily life
ProductInfo.Name: TCL® 4400mAh External Battery Pack Portable Power Bank Charger with built-in Flashlight for Apple: iPad mini, iPhone 5 (Lightning Cable not Provided) / iPhone 4S, iPad 2, iPod; Most Android Phones: Samsung Galaxy S4, S3, S2, S5 Galaxy Note 2, all Samsung Galaxy Series Smartphones; Motorola Droid Razr, X2, Bionic; HTC One X, One S, Sensation, EVO, ThunderBolt; Nokia N9 Lumia 900 800; Blackberry Z10; Sony Xperia Z; GoPro Hero 3/2
